facts.1: National Candy Corn Day is celebrated on October 30th to honor the iconic Halloween treat made of sugar, corn syrup, and marshmallow.
facts.2: Candy corn was invented in the 1880s by George Renninger, an employee of the Wunderle Candy Company.
facts.3: The day encourages people to enjoy candy corn and use it in various Halloween-themed recipes and decorations.

Day 2.title: National Speak Up For Service Day

facts.1: National Speak Up For Service Day is observed on October 30th to recognize the importance of community service and volunteerism.
facts.2: The day encourages individuals to speak up about the value of service and to participate in activities that benefit their communities.
facts.3: It was established by the Sertoma organization to promote the idea that service to others is a vital part of a healthy and thriving society.

facts.1: National Publicist Day is celebrated on October 30th to honor the work of publicists who manage public relations and media communications.
facts.2: The day commemorates the first press release issued by Ivy Lee in 1906, which set the standard for modern public relations practices.
facts.3: Publicists play a crucial role in shaping public perception, managing crises, and promoting clients' achievements and events.
